name: Standard Tutoring Session
description: A standard template for language tutoring sessions, focusing on learning outcomes and practice.

sections.title: Vocabulary Learned
sections.instruction: List all new words and phrases introduced during the session, with translations or definitions if apparent from context.

sections.title: Grammar Points
sections.instruction: Summarize the grammar rules, structures, or patterns covered during the session.

sections.title: Pronunciation Notes
sections.instruction: List pronunciation corrections, tips, and guidance given by the tutor.

sections.title: Conversation Topics
sections.instruction: Describe the conversation topics and scenarios that were practiced.

sections.title: Corrections Made
sections.instruction: List errors or mistakes corrected by the tutor, with the correct form.

sections.title: Key Phrases
sections.instruction: List important phrases worth remembering for study and review.

sections.title: Homework
sections.instruction: List any homework, practice tasks, or study assignments given by the tutor.

sections.title: Progress Notes
sections.instruction: Summarize overall progress observations and areas for improvement.
